short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: useful addon to calling through LiveVox

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension makes sure the Canvassed section of the Agent Panel is always open. Optionally, with a Twilio account it can display whether the current number is a landline/mobile/voip inside LiveVox (enabled from within the popup).

Based on the extension from www.berniepb.com.
